name: MARKET
description:
Its the last day before the supermarket you work in reopens!
Cleanup trash and monitor the place so you can go home early, that's it! grab your mop, clock in, do a bit of cleaning, and leave! don't worry about the faulty wiring and audio distortion of cameras, we are well aware of that, that'll be the next guy's problem

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Right mouse - holdup flashlight

Space + mouse - control movement (crawl, stand, lean, etc)

A game made out of recycled assets, old cameras, crappy audio, and weird controls for the pompous trash jam
